Title: Provides for the de-regulation of rent-stabilized housing accommodations
Summary: Relates to the de-regulation of rent-stabilized housing accommodations; eliminates rent regulation for any regulated housing accommodation that becomes vacant on or after June 16, 2022; makes exceptions.
LawCode: Amd ยง2, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L; amd ยง1, Chap 21 of 1962; amd ยง5, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-504, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency housing rent control law, the local emergency housing rent control act, the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the de-regulation of rent-stabilized housing accommodations upon vacancy
